Assessment.QuestionText: Can you match the properties and methods of <font face="courier new">Graphics</font> class against their corresponding descriptions?

Options.Option: This method creates a Graphics object from the specified image.
This method draws an arc that represents a portion of an ellipse.
This method draws a cardinal spline that is defined by an array of points.
This property specifies or retrieves the page coordinates.
This property specifies or retrieves a region that limits the drawing surface.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct combinations are: (A)-(4), (B)-(5), (C)-(1), (D)-(2), and (E)-(3).
